title: 🍾 Bubbles Party
description:
Join us at Whispering Vine Wine Co. for our annual Bubbles Party. Enjoy a tasting of 30 sparkling wines paired with passed flatbreads in a relaxed and festive atmosphere. It’s a great opportunity to explore a variety of sparkling wines and enjoy an afternoon with friends during the holiday season.

Price: $55/person

This is a ticketed event. Get tickets here.
